content: Hi @Yury G. Kudryashov, looking through #2609 I was a bit confused until I realized it was about https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Point_reflection, not https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reflection_(mathematics). Wikipedia's usage of these terms agrees with my experience, at least. What do you think about renaming reflection to point_reflection or something similar?
Incidentally I have a small file with some properties of reflections (in the sense of reflections in hyperplanes) which I should PR; but currently there would be a naming problem.
I was also confused by this terminology
Since #2609 is already merged, I renamed reflection to point_reflection in #2214
